doc:
Kimberly J. Brown https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kimberly_J._Brown 0 Kimberly Jean Brown (born November 16, 1984) is an American actress, best known to audiences for her portrayal of the teen witch Marnie Piper in the Halloweentown films, in which she starred alongside Debbie Reynolds. Before being cast as Marnie, Brown found notoriety for her role as Marah Lewis on Guiding Light, the third actress to take on the role, and as Annie Wheaton in the Rose Red miniseries, an original miniseries written by Stephen King. Kimberly_Jean_Brown ( born November_16_,_1984 ) is an_American_actress , best_known to audiences for her_portrayal of the_teen_witch_Marnie_Piper in the_Halloweentown_films , in which she starred alongside Debbie_Reynolds . Before being_cast as Marnie , Brown found notoriety for her_role as Marah_Lewis on Guiding_Light , the_third_actress to_take on the_role , and as Annie_Wheaton in the_Rose_Red_miniseries , an_original_miniseries written by Stephen_King .
